dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Gabit Syzdykbekov, the city's Akim, was presented with this suspended cableway project just recently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Gabit Syzdykbekov, the city's Akim, was presented with this suspended cableway project just recently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A project to build a suspended cableway in Shymkent was presented to the city's Akim, Gabit Syzdykbekov, according to the press service of the city administration.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh right, and they discussed the preliminary routes and uh, the possible technological solutions for it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh right, and they discussed the preliminary routes and uh, the possible technological solutions for it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the discussion, preliminary routes, possible technological solutions, and estimated stages of design and construction were reviewed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, the route is supposed to connect a bunch of key areas—like Respublika Avenue, Tauke Khan, Konaev...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, the route is supposed to connect a bunch of key areas-like Respublika Avenue, Tauke Khan, Konaev...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The planned aerial transport route will gradually connect Respublika Avenue, Tauke Khan, Konaev, Baidibek Bi, the Citadel, Abylai Khan, as well as the Turan and Shymkent City neighborhoods.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And Baidibek Bi, the Citadel, Abylai Khan as well. That's a lot of ground to cover.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Baidibek Bi, the Citadel, Abylai Khan as well. That's a lot of ground to cover.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The planned aerial transport route will gradually connect Respublika Avenue, Tauke Khan, Konaev, Baidibek Bi, the Citadel, Abylai Khan, as well as the Turan and Shymkent City neighborhoods.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It really is. The idea is to improve mobility and, um, reduce traffic in those dense, busy parts of the city.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really is. The idea is to improve mobility and, um, reduce traffic in those dense, busy parts of the city.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is noted that the implementation of the project will "improve population mobility, reduce the load on the street-road network"especially in densely built-up areas with heavy traffic"and become a new attraction for tourists."

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Plus, they're it's gonna be a tourist attraction, which is always a nice bonus for a growing city.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus, they're it's gonna be a tourist attraction, which is always a nice bonus for a growing city.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It is noted that the implementation of the project will "improve population mobility, reduce the load on the street-road network"especially in densely built-up areas with heavy traffic"and become a new attraction for tourists."

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And you know, it's not just about transport—the project's expected to create jobs during construction and operation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And you know, it's not just about transport-the project's expected to create jobs during construction and operation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "The launch of the project will open new opportunities for integrating modern solutions into the urban environment, stimulate the development of surrounding areas, and create additional jobs both during the construction phase and in the operational period," the statement reads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and it sounds like this is part of a bigger push from the national level, following the Head of State's instructions during his visit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and it sounds like this is part of a bigger push from the national level, following the Head of State's instructions during his visit.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The akimat also noted that the initiative is being carried out in accordance with the instructions of the Head of State, voiced during his recent working visit to Shymkent, aimed at developing social, infrastructure, and transport projects.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. They're integrating modern solutions into the urban environment, which could really boost development in those surrounding neighborhoods.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. They're integrating modern solutions into the urban environment, which could really boost development in those surrounding neighborhoods.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "The launch of the project will open new opportunities for integrating modern solutions into the urban environment, stimulate the development of surrounding areas, and create additional jobs both during the construction phase and in the operational period," the statement reads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, aerial transport like this—it's ambitious, but if it works, it could be a game-changer for Shymkent.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, aerial transport like this-it's ambitious, but if it works, it could be a game-changer for Shymkent.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Less congestion, better connectivity... it checks a lot of boxes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Less congestion, better connectivity... it checks a lot of boxes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Let's just hope the design and construction phases go smoothly. These projects can get pretty complex.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Let's just hope the design and construction phases go smoothly. These projects can get pretty complex.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: True, but if they pull it off, it might set an example for other cities in the region.
